channel.title: How to disable this annoying pain text and sound
channel.description:
Hello! Please told me how to disable scientist pain text and shock/paint sound, when someone shoot me I listen this annoying sounds. Also, question #2: "Why multiplayer is not popular?"
[attach=4431,none,249][/attach] ![2016-01-10_00001.jpg|249x111](upload://gsXWHilNNkUNTdvyk7XX9n9AWPi.jpeg)

item.title: How to disable this annoying pain text and sound
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Or maybe the fact that it’s an unfinished, Early Access title, something which there’s a lot of stigmas about purchasing?

item.title: How to disable this annoying pain text and sound
item.dc:creator: MegaKosan
item.description:
hitmany:

Hello! Please told me how to disable scientist pain text and shock/paint sound, when someone shoot me I listen this annoying sounds.
Also, question #2: “Why multiplayer is not popular?”

[attach=4431,none,249][/attach]

  1. Set dialougue to “Subtitles Only”
  2. Multiplayer isn´t nearly as good as HL1, thats why no-one is playing it at the moment.

Read full topic
